x.Description: the MNI coordinate of the electrode in the x-axis

y.Description: the MNI coordinate of the electrode in the y-axis

z.Description: the MNI coordinate of the electrode in the z-axis

size.Description: the size of electrode in mm if it is a depth electrode size defines the diameter, if it is an ECOG electrode size defines the contact surface in mm^2

AnatomicalLocation.Description: the anatomical location of the electrode after mapping its MNI coordinates to the Brainnetome atlas
